title: VSO ConvertXtoDVD 3.1.1.32+keygen
description:
ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.1.32

Key Features

    * Video formats supported: avi, divx, xvid, mov, mkv, flv, mpeg-1, mpeg2-, mpeg-4, nsv, dvr-ms, tivo, ts, ifo, vob, asf, wmv, realmedia, rm, rmvb, ogm, existing files from digital camcorders, TV/Sat, capture cards, etc. No external codecs needed like avi codec download
    * Create DVD menus with different templates available, possibility to add background video, image or audio, have chapter and audio/subtitle menus
    * Conversion advisor wizard, control of the conversion speed vs. quality
    * Fast and quality encoder, typically less than 1 hour for converting 1 movie, and supports Multi-Core processors!
    * Included burning engine with burn speed control choice of SAO or packet writing methods, supports all DVD formats
    * Custom and or automatic chapter creation with markers and preview window
    * Advanced file merging possibilities
    * Audio formats supported internal and external: AC3, DTS, PCM, OGG, MP3, WMA and more...
    * Subtitles files supported internal and external: SRT, .SUB/IDX, .SSA with color and font selection, and supports tags like italic, bold
    * Video output for video standard (NTSC, PAL), TV Screen (Widescreen 16:9, Fullscreen 4:3) and DVD Resolution (Full D1, Boradcast D1, Half D1, SIF), or choose automatic for all choices listed above. Also convert video from NTSC to PAL or PAL to NTSC
    * Video post processing settings like video resize-pad/cropping and de-interlacing options
    * Multilingual support available languages...
    * Optimized for Windows 2000 / XP / Vista

 ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.1.32 - Released 27th of June 2008
========================

Regression fix
improved resilience on bogus RMVB files
preview causing application freeze fix

- 0001953: [Bug] NO audio after 10 mins on a specific rmvb file converted.... (wesson)
- 0001608: [Crash] Application crashes while previewing a specific .ts file (wesson)
- 0001939: [Bug] freeze during title set operation (wesson)

ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.1.31
========================

Fixes minor issues about voice prompts and error handling

- 0001940: [Crash] Exception raised "Unsupported number of input channel for AC3 - 3 (C:WorkplaceFFmpegU_av_audio_file.pas, line 1257) (wesson)
- 0001858: [Bug] Text in master language file wrong causing wrong understanding/confusion (wesson)
- 0001823: [Suggestion] Confusing text in Item 145 (wesson)
- 0001941: [Bug] burn projects even without ANY .ifo (wesson)
- 0001926: [Bug] Unsupported number of input channel for AC3 (wesson)
- 0001942: [Bug] Changing Default value for element location in DVD menus labels does not work (wesson)
- 0001936: [Bug] The word [Default] at treview--> Audio not updated to the translated word (menu 79 item 294) (wesson)
- 0001928: [Bug] Access violation at conversion (wesson)

Bundled with

Burning SDK - 2.1.10
====================

Drive features detection changed

- 0001929: [Bug] sdk issue (wesson)
- 0001862: [Bug] improper detection of the hardware capability (wesson)

ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.1.30
========================
- fix minor access violation when changing the application translation.

ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.1.29
========================

little fix on MOV/MP4 file
update japanese translations

- 0001801: [Bug] change settings by - >setting/tab menu "check mark" but not applied in treeview (wesson)
- 0001368: [Feature Request] v2.99 center items in menu/ chapter pages (wesson)
- 0001672: [Bug] Text lenght indicator issues in the "Thriller" template (wesson)
- 0001620: [Feature Request] for settings in "option" window to be applied if changed even if video files have already been added to xtodvd (wesson)
- 0001566: [Feature Request] Add menu template without animations (wesson)
- 0001673: [Bug] Set some menu options then convert, in the same project, changed menu options will not take (wesson)
- 0001927: [Unsupported file/stream format] MP4 video files, with MPEG4 Video stream & AAC Audio stream, are unsupported. (wesson)

ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.1.28
========================

Improved menu features and new options

- 0001634: [Bug] No AC3 audiostream detected on some .mpg files. (wesson)
- 0001832: [Bug] problem with idx/sub subtitles (wesson)
- 0001855: [Bug] v3.1.0.24: Sound Events Relative Path seems to follow the General-MRU path of the vid (wesson)
- 0001908: [Bug] Wrong subtitle language selected for playing (wesson)
- 0001920: [Bug] Bad AC3 detection on some .TS video files. (wesson)
- 0001861: [Bug] The Film v1.00 (External Template) / Selectors missing (wesson)
- 0001919: [Bug] Start ConvertXtoDVD with Project from Batch / Command Line not working. (wesson)
- 0001923: [Feature Request] Please add ".m2p" to accepted file extensions (wesson)
- 0001807: [Bug] Title text always shown as too long with Imagewall template (wesson)
- 0001916: [Bug] Set as default on audio/sub does not work (wesson)
- 0001866: [Bug] Minimal Template selects video 2 instead of videos 1 as a default on playback (wesson)
- 0001906: [Bug] Imagewall Template, only 1 char in the Title Menu text make it go red (wesson)
- 0001921: [Bug] Bugs on all menus with 2+ movies : when dvd inserted, the second movie is the first selected on the menu. (wesson)
- 0001708: [Feature Request] Return to Title Menu after a video has played (wesson)
- 0001755: [Feature Request] [X] Skip Root Menu [Both Ways] (wesson)
- 0001769: [Feature Request] Skip title menu when there is just one title (wesson)
- 0001736: [Bug] US HDTV 1280x720 60fps Progressive TS always out of sync (wesson)

 ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.0.26 - Released 14th of June 2008
========================

New MPEG Decoder to fix dvr-ms regression and a better preview

- 0001829: [Bug] Regrzssion : Some DVR-MS Files are not recognized - (wesson)
- 0001856: [Bug] Wrong subtitle color (black) (wesson)
- 0001695: [Bug] Wrong color for subtitles added to title imported via IFO files (wesson)
- 0001816: [Information] Wrong detection of fps, which results no PullDown when needed ? (wesson)
- 0001881: [Bug] Can&#039;t add AAC file in my ConvertX project... (wesson)
- 0001892: [Bug] regression on drv-ms (wesson)
- 0001891: [Bug] regression with WMV (Photostory files) not supported (wesson)
- 0001901: [Bug] REGRESSION 3.1.0.25 ; Mpg file with VP6 video stream ignored - Unknown format (wesson)

ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.0.25 - Released the 11th of June 2008
========================
-Fixes a regression on some WMV files
-Fixes sample rate problem on AAC audio stream

ConvertXtoDVD - 3.1.0.18 - Released the 21th May 2008

Fixes various subtitles issues

- 0001790: [Bug] Wrong language of subtitle file displayed in log file (wesson)
- 0001814: [Bug] On multilingual sub/idx subtitles, first language is displayed... others are ignored. (wesson)
